name: Scary Ringing Orbs
description:
This game is about answering  scary ringing orbs. 

Glowing orbs will ring and you must use your hearing to track down the next one.

Don't get caught by the spooky ghost!

Contols:

WASD - Move

Left Click - Toggle Flashlight

E - Use/Answer Orb

Useful tips:

  • Your heartbeat will speed up the closer the ghost gets!
  • You can see the ghost's shadow if your flashlight is off!
  • You can adjust the brightness in the settings if it's too dark for you!
